pages.text: When his Lord called him in the holy valley of Tuwa (saying)
Go to Pharaoh, he has certainly rebelled
then say to him, “ Have you the inclination to purify yourself
and that I should guide you to your Lord, so that you fear (Him)?”
Then he showed him the great sign
but he denied and disobeyed
then he turned away in haste
then he gathered to proclaim
then said, “I am your top most Lord.”
So God caught him for punishment (both in) the later and the former (life)
There is certainly a lesson in that for one who fears
Are you the stronger in creation or the sky which He built
He raised its height and then set it in equilibrium
And He darkened its night and brought out its day light
And He stretched out the earth (drifting the continents apart), after that
brought out from the (earth) its water and its pasture
and He firmly anchored the mountains
A provision for you and for your cattle
So when the great predominating calamity comes
the day man will recollect what he earnestly strove after
And the hell will be made manifest for him who sees
So as for him who rebelled
and preferred the life of this world
then hell will certainly be his home
And as for him who feared to stand before his Lord and restrained himself from evil desire
then the garden will certainly be his home
They ask you about the hour of doom, “When will be its anchorage (time of happening) ?”
In what way are you to discuss it
To your Lord (belongs the knowledge of) the ultimate time of its happening
You are a warner only for him who fears it
The day they see it, for them it will be as if they had not stayed (in their graves or this world) except for an evening or a morning of it
